actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to permit injured Federal employees to receive benefits of the Federal employees compensation program notwithstanding they are in receipt of military retired pay, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Permits injured Federal employees to receive benefits of the Federal employees compensation program notwithstanding they are in receipt of military retired pay. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8116(a))

titles.title: A bill to permit injured Federal employees to receive benefits of the Federal employees compensation program notwithstanding they are in receipt of military retired pay, and for other purposes.
